title: Man vs. Video: A$AP Ferg – Persian Wine
body:
_[Man vs. Video](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/tag/man-vs-video/) is a bit looking at the often ignored world of music videos, written by a self-styled asshole with a Lit degree. Artwork by Jimmy Wragg [(@Sui42)](https://twitter.com/Sui42) and words by C R Booth [(@C\_R\_Booth)](https://twitter.com/c_r_booth)  
_

httpv://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI

You can call me a party-pooper if you want, if anyone actually uses the phrase “party-pooper” these days, but my first thoughts when watching the start of A$AP Ferg’s new video for ‘Persian Wine’ were dominated by the rampant health and safety violations. To begin with, [@00:23](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI#t=0m23s) we see a shirtless gentleman waving around an AK-47, which cannot adhere to any of the recommendations laid out by responsible gun-user associations. The whole thing just screams “blown-off nipple” to me.

If that wasn’t bad enough, a guy then climbs/walks on a ladder [@00:37](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI#t=0m37s) with no safety equipment visible whatsoever. It’s a good job that A$AP Ferg & Co. decide to kidnap the man, otherwise who knows what damage he would’ve done to himself wandering around that abandoned building? I hope that [@00:57](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI#t=0m57s) they’re praying for him to gain a bit more common sense; danger awareness is an important attribute for adults.

Something that the video re-roused in my mind is bewilderment over grillz. [@01:07](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI#t=1m07s) we get a close-up of Ferg’s shiny, shiny teeth, which, as $$$WAG as they look, just make me think about how you go about your day-to-day business with metallic dentures. Do you have to take them out to eat? Do they need polishing every night? Do they make your mouth taste weird? The more I think about it, the more it appears to be a sure-fire way to get a huge dentist bill.

Making the ‘Persian Wine’ video even more perplexing, a kid with grillz turns up [halfway through the piece](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIigWhNt4sI#t=2m32s). If I wasn’t already confused enough about their role, this child muddied the waters further. What’s going to happen as he grows up? I suppose they could be handed down to other younglings, but surely they have to molded to a person’s dentures, making the whole thing a financial car crash.

So, in summary, I need a goddamn pair of grillz as soon as humanly possible.
